forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy at times with rain likely. High 12C. Winds SSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and windy at times with periods of rain. High near 55F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early. Then remaining cloudy. Low 41F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 8C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
